Colophon

May 14, 2020

This site is built with 11ty on a Mac and hosted on Github. I´m proud it has a service worker on board – so it´s a Progressive Web App. The typeface is IBM Plex. I write markdown with IA Writer and all code with VS Code. The CSS toolkit is Compose and the client-side search is powered by Lunr.
